byline.original: By ASHLEY PARKER and MICHAEL D. SHEAR
byline.contributor: Jeff Zeleny contributed reporting from Hooksett, N.H.

snippet: In appearances on Monday, Mitt Romney ignored a new video from a Republican presidential rival, Gov. Rick Perry of Texas, attacking him as a serial flip-flopper.
lead_paragraph: In appearances on Monday, Mitt Romney ignored a new video from a Republican presidential rival, Gov. Rick Perry of Texas, attacking him as a serial flip-flopper.

headline.main: Romney, on Friendly Turf, Keeps His Message on the Economy as Attacks Fly
headline.print_headline: Romney, on Friendly Turf, Keeps His Message on the Economy as Attacks Fly
headline.seo: Mitt Romney Ignores Video Attack from Rick Perry
